reviews.text: Great Station, It has A coffee shop for very tasty food and drink toilets although the coffee shop is a bit overpriced And it is a very good conditioned station Although it was 2 years ago when it was refurbished then it is still in great condition!
No toilets, no lifts, where did all the money spent on refurbishment go to...?
Good station. Recently refurbished. Small coffee shop selling hot/cold food/drink. Public toilets. Fully accessible. 2 ticket machines for buy/collect. 1 for collect. 1 staffed counter.

Car park full unless you get there really early. Spaces not clearly marked in places. Motorbikes and cars parked anywhere they like with no controls in place. Ticket office/toilets rarely open, spoke to customer services via telephone after finding ticket office closed numerous times (when it should have been open) and told they have ongoing staffing issues.

Car park normally full by 9am weekdays,toilets are often closed or out of order. The station has undergone a refurbishment and top deck of car park is closed when hard frosts hit, guttering spews torrents of water in various locations when heavy rain falls. Staffing can be erratic. Great coffee shop on site.
